content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (x=1.0, y=1.0) and (x=3.0, y=1.0)
- Two burner inserters at (x=1.5, y=2.5) and (x=3.5, y=2.5)
- Two wooden chests at (x=1.5, y=3.5) and (x=3.5, y=3.5) storing iron plates
- Additional wooden chest and burner inserter setup at (x=5.5, y=3.5) and (x=5.5, y=2.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (Position x=2-4, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (x=2.0, y=7.0) and (x=4.0, y=7.0)
- Four burner inserters at (x=2.5, y=8.5), (x=4.5, y=8.5), (x=3.5, y=9.5), and (x=4.5, y=8.5)
- Two wooden chests at (x=2.5, y=9.5) and (x=4.5, y=9.5)
- Transport belt system connecting furnaces to chests

### Assembly Line System (Position x=14-21, y=11-15)
Consists of:
- Two assembling machines at (x=14.5, y=14.5) and (x=21.5, y=15.5)
- Multiple wooden chests at (x=14.5, y=11.5), (x=21.5, y=11.5), (x=11.5, y=13.5), (x=17.5, y=14.5)
- Multiple burner inserters connecting chests to assembling machines
- Complex belt system for material transport

### Power Generation System (Position x=2-13, y=35)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (x=2.5, y=35.5)
- Boiler at (x=7.0, y=35.5)
- Steam engine at (x=13.5, y=35.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Ensure sufficient coal is available in inventory before attempting to insert fuel into machines
- Keep track of fuel levels in burner inserters and boilers to prevent operation interruptions

### Resource Flow Issues
- Multiple inserters are waiting for source items - ensure proper material flow through the production line
- Some chests are reported as full - consider adding more storage or improving item extraction

### Production Bottlenecks
- Assembling machines lacking required ingredients (copper plate, iron plate, copper cable) - ensure proper supply chain
- Some furnaces have no ingredients to smelt - maintain consistent ore supply

### Fluid System Management
- One offshore pump has no fluid connections - ensure proper pipe connections for all fluid-handling entities
- Monitor steam and water flow in the power generation system to maintain consistent electricity production
